title: Lifelong Learning Pathway Design: Project-Based Learning for Strengthening Language Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device utilization skills and foundational language learning abilities
context.additional_context: Learners are current professionals requiring language acquisition for practical application, participating in project-based collaborative learning using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply the learning pathway design process based on IMS-LD standards.
Learners evaluate their language competencies and establish improvement plans through project-based task performance.
Learners can implement conditions for achieving learning outcomes and evaluation criteria in a digital environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
